statements: SELECT * FROM BillingInformation;
SELECT billing_id, customer_id, billing_amount FROM BillingInformation WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT billing_id, payment_method FROM BillingInformation WHERE billing_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, billing_amount FROM BillingInformation WHERE billing_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation WHERE billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT billing_id, customer_id, billing_date FROM BillingInformation WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY billing_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(billing_id) AS total_billings FROM BillingInformation GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_billings > 3 ORDER BY total_billings DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(billing_amount) AS total_spent FROM BillingInformation WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT payment_method, AVG(billing_amount) AS avg_bill_amount FROM BillingInformation GROUP BY payment_method ORDER BY avg_bill_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation;
SELECT customer_name, billing_address FROM BillingInformation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, customer_name, billing_address, payment_method FROM BillingInformation ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM RecurringPayments WHERE payment_frequency = 'monthly';
SELECT * FROM RecurringPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, billing_address FROM BillingInformation ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT billing_address, customer_name, payment_method FROM BillingInformation ORDER BY payment_method DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_amount FROM BillingInformation JOIN RecurringPayments ON BillingInformation.id = RecurringPayments.customer_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM BillingInfo;
SELECT name, credit_card_number FROM BillingInfo WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT id, payment_amount, payment_frequency FROM RecurringPayments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT billing_info_id, start_date, next_payment_date FROM RecurringPayments WHERE payment_frequency = 'monthly';
SELECT id, name, credit_card_number FROM BillingInfo;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_frequency, next_payment_date FROM RecurringPayments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_status, amount FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_status = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BillingInfo JOIN RecurringPayments ON BillingInfo.id = RecurringPayments.billing_info_id WHERE BillingInfo.customer_id = 123;
SELECT id, start_date, payment_amount FROM RecurringPayments WHERE payment_frequency = 'MONTHLY'
SELECT * FROM billing_info;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT billing_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM billing_info WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, start_date, amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT payment_id, amount, status FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, address FROM customer WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT billing_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM billing_info WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, active FROM recurring_payments WHERE frequency = 30 AND active = TRUE ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount, status FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 2 AND status = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, start_date, amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE active = TRUE AND amount >= 50 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM billing_info;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM billing_info WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, billing_address FROM billing_info ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, plan_price FROM subscription_plans WHERE plan_price BETWEEN 10.50 AND 50.00;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, billing_address FROM billing_info WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date, recurring_interval FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT method_id, payment_type, card_number FROM payment_methods WHERE expiration_date > CURDATE();
SELECT plan_name, plan_price, plan_description FROM subscription_plans ORDER BY plan_price ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT p.payment_status, rh.payment_date FROM payment_history AS ph INNER JOIN recurring_payments AS p ON ph.payment_id = p.payment_id WHERE ph.payment_status = 'success';
